attributes.action: mandate that all the Home Nations of the United Kingdom be represented in the World & European Football Cups by a united team.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order for all the citizens of United Kingdom to feel a sense of belonging to, and to support, the Union, the Home Nations of the United Kingdom should be represented in the World & European Football Cups by a united team, in the same way that we are represented by a united team in the Olympics.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
